snippet: Boeing's 787 Dreamliner, the lighter, more-fuel efficient aircraft recently made its American debut with the Chilean carrier LAN Airlines.
abstract: Boeing's 787 Dreamliner, the lighter, more-fuel efficient aircraft recently made its American debut with the Chilean carrier LAN Airlines.

headline.main: Dreamliner Makes Its Debut in Chile
